Text: When Ladies Meet (1941 film):  The screenplay by S.K. Lauren and Anita Loos was based upon a 1932 play by Rachel Crothers.

Text: When Ladies Meet (1941 film):  The film was a remake of the 1933 pre-Code film of the same name, which starred Ann Harding, Myrna Loy, Robert Montgomery, and Frank Morgan in the roles played by Garson, Crawford, Taylor and Marshall.
